title: Baiting
body:
You say that I "bait" in my postings but I don't even know what that means.

You are using lingo for something that I do and I don't even know what I'm doing yet.

I think the moderators are just poor moderators siding with people that like to complain for no reason.

replies.body:
I have no idea, but it needs more scuttler. 
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/31/Rift_Scuttler_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151202202627

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ylasXlTk,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-18T06:34:29.028+0000)
>
> You say that I &quot;bait&quot; in my postings but I don&#039;t even know what that means.

Baiting is when you say something in a way designed to start an argument or to make people upset.
At peak hours over 7 million people are playing this game. What could possibly lead you to the idea that you, a bronze 5 player with 100 some games on Fiora, are the reason Riot nerfed her?
